required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Trial of YuWell YE900 Electronic Sphygmomanometer
clinical_study.official_title: Validation of the YuWell YE900 Medical Electronic Blood Pressure Monitor in Adults and Children According to the AAMI/ESH/ISO 81060-2:2018 Standard

lead_sponsor.agency: The Second Hospital of Nanjing Medical University

collaborator.agency: Jiangsu Yuyue medical equipment & supply Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: The Second Hospital of Nanjing Medical University

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the accuracy of the YuWell YE900 medical electronic blood pressure monitor for blood pressure measurements in adults and children according to the Association for the Advancement of Medical Instrumentation/European Society of Hypertension/International Organization for Standardization (AAMI/ESH/ISO) Universal Standard (ISO 81060-2:2018).

arm_group.description: Blood Pressure Measurement with the YuWell YE900 Electronic Sphygmomanometer (YuWell YE900) and with Desk Mercury Sphygmomanometer.

intervention.description: Measurement blood pressure by YuWell YE900 Electronic Sphygmomanometer and Desk Mercury Sphygmomanometer.

overall_official.affiliation: The Second Hospital of Nanjing Medical University

facility.name: The Second Affiliated Hospital of Nanjing Medical University

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: The Second Hospital of Nanjing Medical University
